plugins.prepareCmd: echo 'Updating version to ${nextRelease.version}' && sed -i.bak 's/version: .*/version: ${nextRelease.version}/' pubspec.yaml && rm pubspec.yaml.bak && echo 'Updated pubspec.yaml' && sed -i.bak 's/alphasow_ui: \^[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+/alphasow_ui: ^${nextRelease.version}/' README.md && rm README.md.bak && echo 'Updated README.md dependency' && sed -i.bak 's/version-[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+-blue/version-${nextRelease.version}-blue/' README.md && rm README.md.bak && echo 'Updated README.md version badge' && sed -i.bak 's/alphasow_ui: \^[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+\.[0-9]\+/alphasow_ui: ^${nextRelease.version}/' docs/docs/intro.md && rm docs/docs/intro.md.bak && echo 'Updated docs/docs/intro.md'
